snippet: “Sculpture in the Age of Donatello” features 23 pieces from the Florence Cathedral that illustrate the birth of the Renaissance.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibition Sculpture in the Age of Donatello: Renaissance Masterpieces From Florence Cathedral at Museum of Biblical Art.
lead_paragraph: “Sculpture in the Age of Donatello” features 23 pieces from the Florence Cathedral that illustrate the birth of the Renaissance.

headline.main: Review: Donatello in a Valedictory Show at the Museum of Biblical Art
